objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has gained access to a global administrator account in Azure AD and has used `Service Principal` credentials in Exchange.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Microsoft 365 2022)(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)
